title: Bots in aram
body: How can the issue of bots in aram be resolved? every game almost has 1 or more bots guaranteed. its ruining my game experience and no doubt alot of other players are effected. Help plz

replies.body:
mate it's happens to me as well, it's really brings out the frustration that something needs to be done like legitimately. if riot do not fix this, then we have a major issue on our hands and deeply be disappointed if they won't be able to resolve this utterly ridiculous nonsense bugs within the lol client data systems. It's need to be checked, or even double monitored on how to tackle this nightmare, hopefully we will find a solution on breaking the ice in this situation. 

Cheers!

I had a long period of time that I almost always have at least 2 bots in my aram game, it always happen in the morning.

Ever since grinding for odyssey mission, I have hit 50% win rate on aram games, only rarely we'd have 1 or 2 bot in my game, certainly win rate helps

Level up simple, or get ranked bots are only really prominent pre 30 sometimes when you're level 30 but once you get out of lower levels you won't see them too much unless you duo a pre 30 player they tend to just gain levels to 'x' desired level then move on to their next account they bot not much you can really do.

so theres no solution to bots pre 30?
Fuck. me. dead.
Nope not really considering there are barely any pre30 players to begin with that play aram.
